item.description:
November 19, 2009- Monthly Meeting
Joe Craft, CPA

Top 10 mistakes even your Tax Professional can make.
It’s your money!! So no one is going to watch it like you will!!

You don’t have to know every detail of how your accountant does your taxes – but you know what they say: You don’t know what you don’t know. So come and find out! It may change your investing life!

The more you know about your money and taxes, the more you’ll keep of the money, and the less you’ll pay of the taxes.


Topics he'll cover:

How to exclude the gain on a rental property
How to know when you are keeping the property too long
Do you sell the building, or the entity that holds the building? Which is better for you?
When to plan for higher capital gains tax rates
Be careful how you limit risk - it can cost you
How to treat your business like a business
Tax ramifications of options - both buying and selling
Can you take 100% depreciation on that office furniture - (hint: when you can write off the whole amount NOW)
Land improvements and why they are not land, and not a building, and why you care
Write off even more - with cost segregation
And lots more!! Joe gives real-world information that you can use today, to keep more in your pocket.


LEARN WHY IT’S NOT WHAT YOU MAKE THAT MATTERS, IT'S WHAT YOU KEEP THAT MATTERS THE MOST

Come hear from the expert - Joe Craft, CPA


Joe Craft has been a Certified Public Accountant for over 20 years and is the author of "Annual Record Keeping Kit for Small and Home-Based Businesses." His focus is to help people keep more of the money they make.

This meeting is good for 1 hour of Management credit for our PHP Program. Visit www.bostonareia.com for more information on PHP.

Monthly Meeting
5:30 - 6:15 PM - Power Hour - Networking
6:30 PM - Meeting
Location: Best Western Hotel, 380 Winter St, Waltham, Ma
Free to members, Visitors only $25 at the door.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Top 10 Mistakes Even Your Tax Preparer Can Make
